Uses of Class
com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.speech_to_text.v1.RecognizeOptions.Builder

  • Packages that use RecognizeOptions.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.speech_to_text.v1
    Speech to Text Service v1

    • Uses of RecognizeOptions.Builder in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.speech_to_text.v1

      Methods in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.speech_to_text.v1 that return RecognizeOptions.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.contentType(String contentType)
      The format of the audio data specified as one of the following values:
      audio/flac for Free Lossless Audio Codec (FLAC) audio/l16 for Linear 16-bit Pulse-Code Modulation (PCM). audio/wav for Waveform Audio File Format (WAV) audio/ogg;codecs=opus for Ogg format files that use the opus codec .
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.continuous(Boolean continuous)
      If true, multiple final results that represent multiple consecutive phrases separated by pauses are returned.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.inactivityTimeout(Integer inactivityTimeout)
      Inactivity timeout.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.interimResults(Boolean interimResults)
      If true, the service sends interim results for the transcription.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.keywords(String[] keywords)
      Specifies an array of keyword strings to be matched in the input audio.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.keywordsThreshold(Double keywordsThreshold)
      Specifies a minimum level of confidence that the service must have to report a matching keyword in the input audio.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.maxAlternatives(Integer maxAlternatives)
      Maximum number of alternative transcripts returned.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.model(String model)
      Sets the model name used for the recognition.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.newBuilder()
      New builder.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.session(SpeechSession session)
      Sets the session id.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.sessionId(String sessionId)
      Sets session id.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.timestamps(Boolean timestamps)
      If true, time alignment for each word is returned.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.wordAlternativesThreshold(Double wordAlternativesThreshold)
      Specifies a minimum level of confidence that the service must have to report a hypothesis for a word from the input audio.
      RecognizeOptions.Builder RecognizeOptions.Builder.wordConfidence(Boolean wordConfidence)
      If true, confidence measure per word is returned if available.
